oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of James A. Cook and his wife, Kate Cook
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Frame including photograph of James A. Cook and his wife Kate; an account from Confederate States of America for damages to James Cook for $6,368; a letter confirming account information is correct; and a form No. 13 from the Confederate States of America to James Cook stating Cook is owed $800 in damages.
